response.overview: Cara is a determined young woman on a mission to seek justice for all women who have suffered from harassment. With a sharp intellect and a deadly plan in mind, she lures men who have wronged women to her home under the guise of dinner dates. However, these dates end in fatal consequences, with Cara using the remains of her conquests as fertiliser for her plants. In this twisted tale of revenge, Cara will stop at nothing to make the world a better place for women, even if it means turning her home into a living cemetery for her victims.
response.title: Where's That Smile?
